topics.body:
Well, I'm tired and now going to sleep.
I've been doing some regular workouts for a week already. I really hope it becomes a habit afterwards and stops me from staying as a lazy prick.

Dumbbell lifting.
Pushups.
Situps.
Squats.
Stretches. (I noticed how fucking rigid I am. I can't even reach my toes despite being so slim.)

That's all. It's not even much.
